categories: Category:Arquitens-class command cruisers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Centicore was an Arquitens-class command cruiser in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At some point, the light cruiser fired shots at a target from behind an asteroid. It was equipped with engines and turbolasers.
The Centicore was first mentioned in the 2016 Imperial Light Cruiser Expansion Pack for Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: Armada, on a card of the same name.
